title: Perm ban by 3rd party program. I didn't use one. Not even Overwolf. (Part 2)

embed.description: I was told by someone i assume by riot on twitter by the name of "@Elthision" who told me to write a post so you can talk to me about my ban, but nothing about getting my account back. Which is why i originally said no to this.

body:
This is the 2nd Discussion.
Riot stopped replying. Thus making a new discussion to get Riot's attention because it seems they think they can just not reply and i'll let it slide. Not with my account they won't!

I won't give up. Won't stop.
I did NOTHING wrong, didn't use a 3rd party program, Didn't modify my client. Nothing!

The link to the last Discussion is here:
http://boards.oce.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/player-behaviour/O1WeE56j-suspended-permanently-for-modifying-my-client-when-i-didnt-unjust-permban-im-100-innocent?comment=0005

I will keep trying to get more attention to this because i really didn't do anything wrong. I just am an average 20yr old that works and play League with friends in my spare time. I have never wanted to hack, cheat, lie. Nothing.
But if i get banned for doing nothing. Then i might as well hack, cheat and lie and become master tier using cheats because playing correctly and fair gets you banned apparently! - i've spent over $1000 AU on my one and only account. Explain to me WHY i would ever want to cheat and hack??? No logic here!

replies.body:
I'll just tell you now that you don't need to stop because you might as well just get permanently banned from Boards as well. Although, I commend you for not giving up.

Riot Banning Prank (Gone Wrong! Gone Sexual! Gone Mayonnaise!)

Thanks. I won't give up on my account because i didn't do anything wrong. It's like the justice system gone wrong. And there's probs lots of cases every year that are wrong. But they just try their best. Same with Riot. Although compared to the justice system, i cant do more to correct Riot's wrong doing :) so it's a little bit in my favor that one day i will be able to join my friends once again :)

Thanks for the support tho, it's a little rare to see!
how is it wrong that they banned u?
Because i didn't do what they said i did. And they won't help me prove that i didn't do it.

The journey will be perilous, it will be long.

Just kidding, go talk to Maraudaur, Agent Mindstar, Riot Gehirn, or Riot Zaps, something might be figured out then if you manage to contact them. They are nice understanding people, Have a chat with them about the problem, who knows, if you don't totally offend them, they will probably try help you.

Gehirn jumped into his last post to clarify and finalise it. He was detected for boosting and third party application use and banned as a result. 

To clarify for OP, you admitted account sharing, it doesn't matter if YOU used scripts/3rd party etc on the account, but it was used on the account at some point, hence the ban. You are responsible for all activity on your account.


>[Post by Riot Gehirn](http://boards.oce.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/player-behaviour/O1WeE56j-suspended-permanently-for-modifying-my-client-when-i-didnt-unjust-permban-im-100-innocent?comment=00040001000000000000000000000000)

> I believe I know where the confusion is coming from.

> It appears your account was being elo-boosted, and was detected for 3rd party tool usage at the time. Someone else may have been playing on the account, but as the creator you are responsible for any actions taken on the account. This permanent ban cannot be reversed.

I was not banned for account sharing.

And i didn't use 3rd party programs and if Riot actually helped me, i could prove it. and i intend to!
So instead of replying like i'm some kind of criminal or against Riot. I just want to play with my friends. i never wanted to hack, i never did. and was not planning on it at all. And i know i can prove it because i know i didnt use a 3rd party program. Therefore Riot has no proof that i did by that logic.
My point was if the other person using your account used 3rd party then the account would still be banned.
How do i get in contact to these guys'n'girls?
u were booting/boosted ur fault get over it

I was not.
And i will not.
still not submitted those logs of proof yet?
I dont know where to send them. They have not asked for them because they are not helping me. :(
Take a long think. Where do logs normally go when they ask for them?

I said "they have not asked for them"
I know where they are. But i dont know who to send them to because nobody is helping me and asking for my logs. instead they just push me away.
I now have over 7 support tickets or so because they keep closing them saying they wont help me
Hire a lawyer to win the case.
Don't quite have the cash.
U just got pranked
At no point does this help me in anyway shape or form. And SoFlo is not an idol i would suggest trying to copy from. Trust me. It'll be all downhill from here.
